=API for walk=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.walk))
}}}

===postwalk===
====function====
<pre>
Usage: *(_postwalk_ f form)*
</pre>
<pre>  Performs a depth-first, post-order traversal of form.  Calls f on
each sub-form, uses f's return value in place of the original.
Recognizes all Clojure data structures except sorted-map-by.
Consumes seqs as with doall. </pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#52 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=postwalk+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]
----
===postwalk-demo===
====function====
<pre>
Usage: *(_postwalk-demo_ form)*
</pre>
<pre>  Demonstrates the behavior of postwalk by printing each form as it is
walked.  Returns form. </pre>

===postwalk-replace===
====function====
<pre>
Usage: *(_postwalk-replace_ smap form)*
</pre>
<pre>  Recursively transforms form by replacing keys in smap with their
values.  Like clojure/replace but works on any data structure.  Does
replacement at the leaves of the tree first. </pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#111 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=postwalk-replace+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]

===walk===
====function====
<pre>
Usage: *(_walk_ inner outer form)*
</pre>
<pre>  Traverses form, an arbitrary data structure.  inner and outer are
functions.  Applies inner to each element of form, building up a
data structure of the same type, then applies outer to the result.
Recognizes all Clojure data structures except sorted-map-by.
Consumes seqs as with doall. </pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#35 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=walk+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]
